title: 英國外相藍韜文：除非中國停止在港實行國安法，否則將會向BNO持有人提供更大權利

replies.msg:
Breaking: Dominic Raab tells China that unless it suspends plans for new security laws in Hong Kong, the UK will give greater visa rights to 300,000+ British National (Overseas) passport holders. Current right to 6 mths in Britain without visa would be increased to 12 mths.

In pool interview, Raab said: "In relation to BNO passport holders, as you know currently they only have the right to come to the UK for six months. If China continues down this path and implements this national security legislation, we will change that status."

Raab continued: "And we will remove that six month limit and allow those BNO passport holders to come to the UK and to apply to work and study for extendable periods of 12 months and that will itself provide a pathway to future citizenship."

Source:
https://twitter.com/bbcjlandale/status/1266014175563862016

我認為應該要咁：

首先最重要最必須，係重新開放新申請，最理想係97.7.1前香港出世既全部可以新申請 。退一萬步，至少至少，都應該比當年deadline時未夠18歲而父母冇申請嗰D，真係最無辜。

如果資料冇錯，77-81年出世既deadline係96.3.31，之後就係82年同之後出世，即係78.4.1 - 97.6.30香港出世嗰D，務必要開放新申請，否則乜都唔使講。

其次就增設世襲制，父母雙方或其中一方係BNO既97後，可以世襲BNO。
